dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4807 IH: Protect Our Hospitals Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Landsman (for himself, Mr. Ruiz, Ms. Kelly of Illinois, and Mrs. Dingell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend Public Law 119–21 to repeal certain changes to provider taxes under the Medicaid program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protect Our Hospitals Act.

section.header: Repealing changes to Medicaid provider taxes
section.text: Section 71115 of Public Law 119–21 is repealed, and the provisions of law amended by such section are restored as if such section had not been enacted into law.
